description: Screeps Ant Swarm Bot Statistics Dashboard

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat"::tag = 'data.empire.cpuUsed') AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat"::tag = 'data.empire.cpuBucket') AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat"::tag = 'data.cpu.percent') AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat"::tag = 'data.empire.cpuLimit') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_subsystem' AND "stat" = 'avg_cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT max("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_subsystem' AND "stat" = 'peak_cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_room' AND "stat" = 'avg_cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_room' AND ("stat" = 'avg_cpu' OR "stat" = 'peak_cpu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sub_category", "stat"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.creeps' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.rooms' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT value FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat"::tag = 'data.empire.gcl') AND $timeFilter

SELECT "progress_last" / "total_last" AS "percent" FROM (SELECT last("value") AS "progress_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'gcl.progress' AND $timeFilter), (SELECT last("value") AS "total_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'gcl.progress_total' AND $timeFilter)
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'gpl.level' AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'system.tick' AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE ("stat" = 'empire.energy.storage' OR "stat" = 'empire.energy.terminal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "stat"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'room' AND "stat" =~ /storage\.energy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'room' AND "stat" =~ /controller\.progress_percent$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "type" = 'scrape_success' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "mode"
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "type" = 'scrape_success' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mode"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" =~ /empire\.energy\.(available|capacity)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "stat"

SELECT "available_last" / "capacity_last" AS "utilization" FROM (SELECT last("value") AS "available_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.energy.available' AND $timeFilter), (SELECT last("value") AS "capacity_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.energy.capacity' AND $timeFilter)

SELECT "storage_last" + "terminal_last" AS "total_energy" FROM (SELECT last("value") AS "storage_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.energy.storage' AND $timeFilter), (SELECT last("value") AS "terminal_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.energy.terminal' AND $timeFilter)

SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'room' AND ("stat" =~ /rcl$/ OR "stat" =~ /creeps$/ OR "stat" =~ /energy\.available$/ OR "stat" =~ /energy\.capacity$/ OR "stat" =~ /storage\.energy$/ OR "stat" =~ /controller\.progress_percent$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sub_category", "stat"

SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'room' AND "stat" =~ /pheromone\.(expand|harvest|build|upgrade|defense|war|siege|logistics|nukeTarget)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category", "stat"

SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'room' AND "stat" =~ /(brain\.danger|brain\.posture_code|brain\.colony_level_code|pheromone\.(expand|defense|war|logistics|upgrade|build|harvest|siege|nukeTarget)|metrics\.energy\.harvested|metrics\.energy\.spawning|metrics\.hostile_count)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sub_category", "stat"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_role' AND "stat" = 'avg_cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sub_category"
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "category" = 'profiler_role' AND ("stat" = 'avg_cpu' OR "stat" = 'peak_cpu' OR "stat" = 'count') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sub_category", "stat"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" =~ /^nativeCalls\./ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "stat"
SELECT last("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" =~ /^nativeCalls\./ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stat"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'empire.credits' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'heapUsed' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT "sys_last" - "prof_last" AS "Tick Lag" FROM (SELECT last("value") AS "prof_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'profiler.tick_count' AND $timeFilter), (SELECT last("value") AS "sys_last" FROM "screeps" WHERE "stat" = 'system.tick' AND $timeFilter)

title: Screeps Ant Swarm
